tool.name: FASTA-to-Tabular
tool.description: Converts a FASTA file to Tabular format
tool.help:
**Example**
A fasta file with two sequences::
>EYKX4VC01B65GS length=54 xy=0784_1754 region=1 run=R_2007_11_07_16_15_57_ CCGGTATCCGGGTGCCGTGATGAGCGCCACCGGAACGAATTCGACTATGCCGAA >EYKX4VC01BNCSP length=187 xy=0558_3831 region=1 run=R_2007_11_07_16_15_57_ CTTACCGGTCACCACCGTGCCTTCAGGATTGATCGCCAGATCGGTCGGTGCGTCAGGCGG GGTGACATCGCCCACCACGGTACTCACTGGCTGGCTCTGGTTCCCGGCGGCATCGGAGGC CACCACGTTGAGGGTATTCCCCTCGGTTTGTGGCTCGGTGAGAACCACGTTGTAGTCGCC ATTGGTC
Returns::
>EYKX4VC01B65GS length=54 xy=0784_1754 region=1 run=R_2007_11_07_16_15_57_ CCGGTATCCGGGTGCCGTGATGAGCGCCACCGGAACGAATTCGACTATGCCGAA >EYKX4VC01BNCSP length=187 xy=0558_3831 region=1 run=R_2007_11_07_16_15_57_ CTTACCGGTCACCACCGTGCCTTCAGGATTGATCGCCAGATCGGTCGGTGCGTCAGGCGGGGTGACATCGCCCACCACGGTACTCACTGGCTGGCTCTGGTTCCCGGCGGCATCGGAGGCCACCACGTTGAGGGTATTCCCCTCGGTTTGTGGCTCGGTGAGAACCACGTTGTAGTCGCCATTGGTC
